# Coding exercise: A simple neutral model of biodiversity

## Key questions

1. How do we implement a process model in R?
1. How do we use this model to explore how parameter settings affect outcomes?

## Lesson objectives

1. Code up UNTB in R.
1. Change parameter settings and inspect the outcomes. 

## Lesson outline


### (Group project) Code up UNTB in R!

### (Backup) 

Source the pre-coded UNTB located [here](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/role-model/process-models-workshop/main/neut_mod/neutral_mod.R)

### (Breakout groups or individual) Change parameter settings manually and visualize outcomes.
